japanese: この度は、本当に申し訳ございませんでした……。
translation: I humbly apologize for what happened...

japanese:
まったく、夕食の準備をしようとして驚いたわよ。
残ってた食材をほとんど使っちゃってたなんて。
translation:
My MY, I'm so surprised to find that you've used up
most of the leftover ingredients, now that I'M trying
to prepare dinner.

japanese:
すまん……。
俺も夕食のことまでは考えてなかった……。
translation:
Sorry...
I totally didn't think of dinner, either...

japanese:
あの、夕ご飯はどうなるのでしょうか？
明日の朝ご飯も……。
translation:
Um, what's going to happen to dinner?
And breakfast tomorrow, too...

japanese: 五月さんが死にそうな顔してるよ！？
translation: Itsuki-san, you look like you're gonna die!!

japanese:
うーん、この時間からでも集められる食材……。
森に行くよりは魚釣りのほうがましかな。
translation:
Hmm, what ingredients can be gathered,
right now...
Fishing is better than going to the forest, I guess.

japanese:
それでも、もうすぐ日が落ちるし危険だが
やるしかないか。
なら責任持って俺が……。
translation:
And still, it's dangerous since the sun is about to set,
but we have no choice but to do it.
Then I'll take responsibility and...

japanese:
待って、そこまでしなくてもいいわ。
余ってるものでなんとかする。
translation:
Wait, you don't have to go that far.
I'll manage somehow with what we have left.

japanese: なんとかできるんですか！？
translation: Can you really manage?!

japanese:
私を誰だと思ってるのよ。
ちょっと質素になるけど、そこは我慢しなさいよね。
translation:
Who do you think I am?
We'll have to make do with something simple
but you'll just have to put up with it.

japanese: わ、私も手伝う！
translation: I-I'll help too!

japanese:
当然でしょ。
まあ、ついでに、こういうときにできる工夫を
しっかり教えてあげるわ。
translation:
Of course you will.
Well, while we're at it, I'll teach you some tricks
that you can use in situations like this.

japanese:
うん、しっかり勉強する。
よろしくお願いします。
translation:
Yeah, I'll do my best to learn from you.
Thank you.

japanese:
私も手伝うね！
そういうの得意だよ！
translation:
I'll help too!
I'm good at this kind of thing!

japanese: ああ、ありがとうございます……！
translation: Th-th-thank you very much!

japanese: あの様子なら、三玖、もう大丈夫だね。
translation: If she's acting like this, Miku's doing fine.

japanese: うん、もういつもの三玖だよ！
translation: Yep, that's the Miku we know!

japanese:
フータロー、お腹は大丈夫？
まだつらいなら、洗い物の手伝いなんて
しなくていいよ？
translation:
Futaro, is your stomach okay?
If it still hurts,
you don't have to help with the dishes.

japanese:
大丈夫だ。
まあ、夕飯はほとんど腹に入らなかったけどな。
translation:
I'm fine.
Well, I couldn't really fit anything inside me
during dinner, though.

japanese:
それに、食材を使い切っちまったのは
俺にも責任があるわけだし。
このくらいはしておきたい。
translation:
Using up all the ingredients
is my responsibility too.
I'd like to do at least that much.

japanese: そっか……。
translation: Is that so...

japanese:
こうやって並んで洗い物をしてると、
なんだか新婚さんみたい……。
translation:
As we stand here washing dishes together,
we look like newlyweds...

japanese: 俺は、お前がいいな。
translation: You're the one for me, Miku.

japanese:
どうした三玖？
いきなり首振って。
translation:
What's wrong, Miku?
Shaking your head all of a sudden.

japanese: ななな、なんでもないから……！
translation: I-I-I-it's nothing!

japanese:
そうか？
ならいいんだが。
translation:
That so?
Then I'm glad.

japanese:
……フータロー。
今日は本当に、ありがとう。
translation:
...Futaro.
Thank you so much for today.

japanese:
もう気にするな。
俺としては、家庭教師の仕事したまでだって
言っただろ？
translation:
Don't worry about it.
I told you it's part of my job as your tutor, didn't I?

japanese:
さっき、二乃やらいはちゃんと一緒に
料理をしてて、本当に楽しかったんだ。
そう思えたのはフータローのおかげ。
translation:
Earlier, Nino, Raiha-chan and I
were having so much fun cooking together.
It's all thanks to you.

japanese: ただ……。
translation: But...

japanese: ただ？　どうした？
translation: But? What?

japanese:
ねえ、フータロー。
こっち向いて。
translation:
Hey, Futaro.
Look at me.

japanese: は？　なんだ？
translation: Huh? What?

japanese:
っ！……
だ、だから、なんだよ、人をじっと見て。
translation:
!...
Wh-what, are you doing, just staring at me?

japanese:
フータロー、言ってくれたよね。
私はもっと上を目指そうとするに決まってるって。
translation:
Futaro, you said it yourself, right?
That I'll definitely aim for something higher.

japanese:
すごく嬉しかった。
でもね……。
translation:
I was really happy to hear that.
But...

japanese:
私の、フータローのためにって気持ちは、
ずっとなくならないから。
translation: My feelings for you, Futaro, will never disappear.

japanese: 三玖……。
translation: Miku...

japanese:
次の目標が見つかっても、その次の目標ができて、
どんどん先に進めたとしても、
やっぱり、この気持ちが……私のはじまり。
translation:
Even if I find my next goal and the goal after that,
these feelings for you...
will always be the beginning.

japanese:
フータローに私の料理を食べてもらいたい。
そして喜んでもらいたい……。
translation:
I want you to taste my cooking, Futaro.
And I want you to be happy...

japanese:
だから、この気持ちは絶対になくならないって……
伝えておきたかった。
translation:
That's why these feelings will never go away...
I just wanted to tell you that.

japanese:
お前さ、そういうことを
真正面からはっきり言うの、やめてくれ。
不意打ちすぎる……。
translation:
Hey, can you not say things like that to me so directly?
It's too surprising...

japanese:
フータローだって、こういうの、たまにやる。
だから困る……。
translation:
You do that to me too, Futaro.
That's why you trouble me sometimes...

japanese: ……確かに困るな。
translation: ...It is troubling, isn't it.

japanese:
で、でも、困るけど困らない。
嫌じゃないし、その……嬉しいこともあるし。
あ、でもやっぱり困るかも……。
translation:
W-well, it's troubling, but it's not...
It's not unpleasant, and well...it makes me happy.
Ah, but actually, it might just be troubling...

japanese: どっちだよ……。
translation: Which is it?

japanese:
あ、あと！　あと１つ！
謝っておきたいことがある！
translation:
A-and! And one more thing!
There's something I want to apologize for!

japanese: 謝る？　なんでだ？
translation: Apologize for? Why?

japanese:
私が悩んでたせいで、昨日も今日も
大して想い出作りができなかったから。
だから……。
translation:
Because I was so worried,
we couldn't really make any good memories
yesterday or today. So...

japanese: いや、想い出ならできただろ。
translation: Nah, we made our memories, didn't we.

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
よく考えてみたら、この島に来てから
今日までの間だけでも充分だ。
お前だって楽しかったんじゃないか？
translation:
When I think about it, just from the time we came
to this island until now, has been enough of a memory.
You must have had fun too, right?

japanese:
……うん。
大変だったし、色々あったけど、
胸を張って楽しかったって言える。
translation:
...Yeah.
It was tough and there were some challenges,
but I can say with confidence that I had a lot of fun.

japanese: この夏のことは、一生忘れない。
translation: I'll never forget this summer.

japanese:
俺もだ。
忘れようとしても無理だし……忘れたくない。
translation:
Me too.
Even if I try to forget, it's impossible...
and I don't want to forget.

japanese:
じゃあ、大成功かな。
想い出作り。
translation: So, it was a great success. Making memories.

japanese: ああ、最初からな。
translation: Yeah, it was a success was from the beginning.

japanese:
ふふっ！
ずっと、大切にしようね。
この想い出を。
translation:
Teehee!
Let's cherish them forever.
All of the memories we made here.
